message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could come down to $13,200, which feels like a fair compromise.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I am unable to go above $12,800.
